name: Admin-console release 2.0
description: We have released the improved account interface for our customers. Please see below for a list of the major features added and see the following blog for more details.

ADDED.text: User Management - > User search and modificaton
Help Docs added in each section in the user Admin-console
Transfer ownership of Site to different email/user
Audit logs for any configuration changes/update
Manage Zendesk tickets from Admin Console page
Access token valid time option in user account

FIXED.text: https and http issue with pre-defined and custom interface
Search By Email Id and UID on user management
Social Icons sprite messing up on social login page
